actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment. Provides that neither the United States nor any State shall deprive any human being of life on account of illness, age, or incapacity.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right to life to the ill, the aged, or the incapacitated.
